players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be killed. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our group."
Charlie: "I agree with Charlie, let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other. It's important that we work together to uncover the truth behind Diana's death."
Bob: "I believe we should focus on finding out who killed Diana. Let's try to gather more information and share any suspicions or observations we may have."
